medical_history.chief_complaint: 2 days of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with 2 days of RUQ pain that worsens with eating and is associated with non-bloody, non-bilious vomiting. The pain does not radiate. No previous episodes or sick contacts reported. Last ingestion was last night with coffee this morning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Breast lumpectomy in 2004, remote cesarean section; no past medical history relevant to the current condition.
